travelplanapp.travelplanapp

Class SearchDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • travelplanapp.travelplanapp.SearchDispatcher

  • @Path(value="/search")
public class SearchDispatcher
extends java.lang.Object
    SearchDispatcher is a class in charge of dispatching search tasks. The methods in this class consume HTTP POST requests including searching for activities, searching for food and redirect the response to search results page.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yanhong Ju

        @POST
@Path(value="/activity")
public void searchActivityPost(@FormParam(value="searchCity")

                                @Context
                                javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                @Context
                                javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Consumes a HttpRequest with searchCity,planName. Redirect the user to page showing all activities in that city.
        Parameters:
        searchCity - City name to search for activities
        request - httpRequest to be processed
        response - httpRequest to be redirected
